constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of new 3 storey residential building, plus basement to create x 8 flats with associated landscaping, bins and cycle store (outline application to consider appearance, layout and scale only).
decision_conditions: The proposed basement units of family accommodation (units with 3 bedrooms), would fail to provide a good standard of amenity for future occupants of the units in terms of provding a poor outlook, creating an undue sense of encolsure for future ocuppants of the units, and providing poor access to outdoor amenity space for any children. The proposal would conflict Paragraph 127 of the NPPF 2019, Policy 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 and Policies CS8, DM10, and DM11 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

Please be advised that the fee for this application is £462, and therefore an additional fee of £256 is required. This can either be paid online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the tree or reduce its amenity value. Recommendation:Approve
